name: Stranded (itch) (Maestro)
description:
Complete Levels by collecting and placing missing platforms

Controls
  • A/Left and D/Right to move left and right respectively.
  • W/Space/Up to jump
  • E to toggle between playing and placing tiles
  • Left Click to place tiles while in Tile Placing Mode
  • Escape to Pause
  • Ctrl+R/Escape>Restart to Restart
Credits
  • Music by https://www.bensound.com/
  • Sound Effects :  https://sfxr.me and https://opengameart.org/content/9-sci-fi-computer-sounds-and-beeps
  • Font : Abel
